chat.opening: The hated boss who beats you down physically and mentally. Yeah, that's right, Big Bad Guzma is here!
chat.win: I'll be happy to beat you anytime!

chat.opening: It's not every day someone comes straight to me for a beating!
chat.win: Can't you just watch out for your own Pokemon and stay out of other people's business?
chat.lose: I'm gonna beat you down one of these days!

chat.opening: You keep getting up in my grill, like a cloud of smoke I can't brush away. It's time I put out your fire at the source!
chat.lose: I got too close to the fire, and I was burned!
